unnormalised: Urban planning in India faces unique challenges. Consider Mumbai, a city struggling with density. PPP models for infrastructure, like flyovers, need careful scrutiny. "Swades" movie highlighted rural-urban disparities relevant even today. The National Institute of Urban Affairs offers insightful research. Effective governance, citizen participation and sustainable solutions are crucial for inclusive urban development. We need better waste management and affordable housing schemes. Remember the impact of the 74th Amendment!
